quoteText:
You do not have to give your personal or legal name to create an npm
account.
You can use a pseudonym instead.

case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
quoteText: npm does not respond to the Do Not Track HTTP header

case: You maintain ownership of your content
quoteText: >Nothing in this Agreement gives npm any ownership rights in intellectual property that you share with npm Services, such as your Account information or any Packages you share with npm Services (Your Content).

case: You are free to choose the type of copyright license that you want to use over your content
quoteText: You decide whether and how to license it.

case: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
quoteText:
>You will indemnify npm, its officers, directors, employees,
representatives, and agents, and hold them harmless for, all liability,
expenses, damages, and costs from any third-party claims, demands,
lawsuits, or other proceedings alleging that Your Content, your use
of npm Services, or both, violate the intellectual property right of
a third party, this Agreement, or applicable law.

case: This service is only available to users over a certain age
quoteText: >You must be at least 13 years of age to use npm Services.

case: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
quoteText:
You will be responsible for all action taken using your account, whether
authorized by you or not, until you either close your account or give
npm notice that the security of your Account has been compromised.
You will notify npm immediately if you suspect the security of your
Account has been compromised.
You will select a secure password for your
Account.
You will keep your password secret.

case: Your account can be suspended for several reasons
quoteText: npm may restrict, suspend, or terminate your Account according to the Copyright Policy, if npm reasonably believes that you are in breach of these Terms, or if npm reasonably believes that you have misused npm Services.

case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
quoteText:
Use of npm Services is at your sole risk.
npm Services are provided
on an "as is" and "as available" basis.

case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
quoteText:
npm makes no warranty that npm Services will meet your requirements,
operate in an uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free manner

case: The service does not guarantee that software errors will be corrected
quoteText: or that errors in npm Services will be corrected.

case: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
quoteText:
You will be
solely responsible for any damage to your computer system and network,
as well as any data loss that may result from use of npm Services or
material received via npm Services.

case: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
quoteText:
>npm Services may provide information and software that is inaccurate,
incomplete, misleading, illegal, offensive, or otherwise harmful.

case: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
quoteText:
Neither npm nor any third-party service provider used by npm to
provide npm Services will, under any circumstances, be liable to you
for any indirect, incidental, consequential, special, or exemplary
damages related to your use of npm Services

case: You waive your right to a class action.
quoteText:
You will settle any Dispute as an
individual, and not as part of a class action or other representative
proceeding, whether as the plaintiff or a class member.
